Section.Catchline: Certain words prohibited in name of organization.

SectionBody.Text: No entity holding a certificate as a multiple-employer welfare arrangement other than a licensed insurer may use in its name, contracts, or literature the term “insurance,” “casualty,” “surety,” or “mutual,” or any other words descriptive of the insurance, casualty, or surety business or deceptively similar to the name or description of any insurance or surety company doing business in the state.
